empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: Every stitch empowers individuals with disabilities to dress with dignity, comfort, and style.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We create adaptive clothing from repurposed textile waste, reducing environmental impact.

community.title: Community
community.description: Crafted by strong, underprivileged women trained to lead production with pride and purpose.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: Fashion that adapts to needs, not the other way around. Everyone deserves to be seen.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Our story began with a moment of clarity when we realized that for millions, clothing wasn't a source of confidence, but of daily struggle. We recognized that adaptive clothing was missing, and so were the voices it was meant to serve.
story.p2: While tons of textile waste were being dumped into our environment, we launched our mission turning this problem into potential; creating adaptive clothes from upcycled materials, sewn by strong, underprivileged women.
story.p3: For those who need more than just clothes; they need to be seen.

need.title: Our Need
need.p1: Getting dressed shouldn't be a daily battle; but for people with mobility, sensory, or physical challenges, it often is.
need.p2: Traditional fashion excludes their needs, adding frustration to already difficult routines.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To Empower. To Include. To BEYOUND.
mission.desc: We exist to empower individuals with disabilities by designing fashion that adapts to their needs, not the other way around. Our mission is rooted in sustainability, social inclusion, and community-driven innovation.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.subtitle: We Created Clothes That Don't Just Fit, They Free.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Impact
sustainable.p2: Crafted by women from overlooked communities

chatbot.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you today? I'm here to answer questions about the BEYOUND brand, our products, and our mission.
chatbot.error: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting. Please try again later.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover why people love our adaptive clothing and the difference it makes in their lives
